Settings.Name: Draw Mouse
Settings.Description: Specify whether to draw the mouse pointer. Use the value 0 to not draw the pointer. Default value is 1.

Settings.Name: Framerate
Settings.Description: Set the grabbing frame rate. Default value is ntsc, corresponding to a frame rate of 30000/1001.

Settings.Name: Image Format
Settings.Description: The image format the screenshot will be saved in.
